Interface CH.ifa.draw.framework.FigureChangeListener

public interface interface FigureChangeListener
extends EventListener
Listener interested in Figure changes.

figureChanged(FigureChangeEvent)
Sent when a figure changed
figureInvalidated(FigureChangeEvent)
Sent when an area is invalid
figureRemoved(FigureChangeEvent)
Sent when a figure was removed
figureRequestRemove(FigureChangeEvent)
Sent when requesting to remove a figure.
figureRequestUpdate(FigureChangeEvent)
Sent when an update should happen.

figureInvalidated 
 public abstract void figureInvalidated(FigureChangeEvent e)
Sent when an area is invalid

figureChanged 
 public abstract void figureChanged(FigureChangeEvent e)
Sent when a figure changed

figureRemoved 
 public abstract void figureRemoved(FigureChangeEvent e)
Sent when a figure was removed

figureRequestRemove 
 public abstract void figureRequestRemove(FigureChangeEvent e)
Sent when requesting to remove a figure.

figureRequestUpdate 
 public abstract void figureRequestUpdate(FigureChangeEvent e)
Sent when an update should happen.
